channel.title: Someone faking my server on mopar
channel.description: Hey, I'm Wildy from Kamakazi Scape, and I found a server that is trying to act like my server (using a webclient to possibly infect people). I don't know why, but they stole everything from my thread on another forum. If a moderator could help please remove 206.217.138.219 from the status page.

item.title: Someone faking my server on mopar
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

I’ll go and check the servers you mentioned earlier out and see if they’re malicious and whatever.

EDIT::

I’m just going to go ahead and ban all the accounts that posted the server copies. There is at least 5 multiple accounts all linked together. All the reported servers should all be removed from the server status page shortly also.

Read full topic

item.title: Someone faking my server on mopar
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

The Wanderer:

Get a mod to test for multiple accounts. Send a pm to a mod with that stuff you have shown and change your attitude slightly. They will most likely be more willing to help someone who is trying to inform them of a rule breaker rather than someone complaining someone stole their server pictures.

This.

Obviously creating a thread about it isn’t helping because some people on this forum aren’t as patient (not pointing). Nonetheless, how about private message a moderator or administrator about it, at least some discussion could take place or something?

Good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Someone faking my server on mopar
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Nobodies Win, post:18, topic:399362”]How would I even be able to gather the proof?
Here is my only proof I am able to gather
http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=206.217.138.219
http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=202.172.26.14

Both of those servers take you to http://www.bit.ly/KamakaziScape525 when you click on play now.

EDIT: http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=204.45.133.74 and that one.
and even this one… http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=193.200.150.125[/quote]

If you cannot prove that they were all created by the same person, and you cannot prove that they are infecting people with a webclient, then there’s nothing the mods can do. Stop crying about it.

Read full topic

No because making multiple accounts is against the rules.

item.title: Someone faking my server on mopar
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Nobodies Win:

But they also stole my pictures and everything?

There is nothing “illegal” or “against the rules” about copying images. Unless you copyright the images, the most you can do is ask them to remove the pictures from their site.

Read full topic
